dmca.title: ArticleInsider.com Alleges Infringement on 6 Sites
dmca.body:
Content Infringement Notice
Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints
On behalf of
ArticleInsider.com
Contact Info:
Infosearch Media, Inc.
[Private]
Marina Del Rey, CA 90292
Phone: [Private]
Fax: [Private]
Attn: [Private]@infosearchmedia.com



Incident #1
The copyrighted work at issue is the article 

"Rate and Term Refinance Mortgage Loan" by Dan 

Draitser posted on the Article Insider web site 

at 

http://homerefinancing.articleinsider.com/38693_r

efinance_mortgage.html
Search Query: "A rate and term refinance loan is 

one where the refinance loan transaction only 

looks"
Infringing Web Pages: 

www.badcreditfinancialexperts.com/article/1300/ra

te_and_term_refinance_mortgage_loan/
My email: [Private]@infosearchmedia.com
Email of infringing website: admin@mail.aca
"I have a good faith belief that use of the 

copyrighted materials described above on the 

allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized 

by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law."
"I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the 

information in the notification is accurate and 

that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to 

act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right 

that is allegedly infringed."

8. Fax to: [Private]


Incident #2
The copyrighted work at issue is the article 

"Professionals Give Tips on Refinancing a 

Mortgage" by Dan Draitser that appears on the 

Article Insider web site at 

http://homerefinancing.articleinsider.com/38697_t

ips_on_refinancing_a_mortgage.html
Search Query: "borrower must beware who is giving 

the tips"
Infringing Web Pages: 

www.fastunsecuredloans.com/article/ 1301 

/professionals_give_tips_on_refinancing_a_mortgag

e/
My email: [Private]@infosearchmedia.com
Email of infringing website: No email. Contact 

Form - 

http://www.fastunsecuredloans.com/contact/contact

/
"I have a good faith belief that use of the 

copyrighted materials described above on the 

allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized 

by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law."
"I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the 

information in the notification is accurate and 

that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to 

act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right 

that is allegedly infringed."

8. Fax to: [Private]
Ann: User Support, DMCA complaints



Incident #3
The copyrighted work at issue is the article 

"Pros and Cons of a No Fee Refinance" by Dan 

Draitser that appears on the Article Insider web 

site at 

http://homerefinancing.articleinsider.com/38705_n

o_fee_refinance.html
Search Query: "A great advantage for the 

borrowers of a no fee refinance Is that they do 

not need to pay any money"
Infringing Web Pages: 

www.badcreditfinancialexperts.com/ 

article/1303/pros_and_cons_of_a_no_fee_refinance/
My email: [Private]@infosearchmedia.com
Email of Infringing website: admin@mail.aca
"I have a good faith belief that use of the 

copyrighted materials described above on the 

allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized 

by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law."
"I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the 

information in the notification is accurate and 

that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to 

act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right

Atm: User Support, DMCA complaints



Incident #4
The copyrighted work at issue is the article 

"Saving on Dental Coverage" by Niki Tam that 

appears on the Article Insider web site at
http://dentalinsurance.articleinsider.com/8197_de

ntal_insurance_site.html. The article on the 

infringing web page incorporates text from the 

fourth, fifth, and sixth paragraphs of the 

copyrighted article.
Search Query: "The most important aspects of 

dental care are preventative measures"

Infringing Web Pages: 

www.dental--care--information.com/dentalplans-bad

-tooth
